title: Oh jagannaathha
sahitya:
O jagannAtha ani nE pilacitE nOyani rArAdA



anupallavi



 rAjIva nayana rAkEndu vadana rAjillu sItA ramaNi hrtsadana



caraNam 1



 idi vELa gAdu ika tALa bOdu madini nIvEgAni mari gati lEdu

   

caraNam 2



 iravonda rAka inka parAkA dora nIvEyani tOpika gAka

   

caraNam 3



 lAlincu rAja ravikOTi tEja lIlAvatAra pAlita tyAgarAja
